metadata.title: CVE-2013-4474 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description:
Format string vulnerability in the extractPages function inutils/pdfseparate.cc in poppler before 0.24.3 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (crash) via format string specifiers in adestination filename.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4474` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.24.3-0ubuntu1
libpoppler-cpp0 - 0.24.3-0ubuntu1
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.24.3-0ubuntu1
libpoppler-qt4-4 - 0.24.3-0ubuntu1
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.24.3-0ubuntu1
libpoppler52 - 0.24.3-0ubuntu1
poppler-utils - 0.24.3-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.24.3-0ubuntu1').
